trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> types to UI Automation.
The element associated with this automation peer.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" /> class.
Minimizes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.
This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> property to `true`.
An object that is in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> for the specified item.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> that is associated with the specified item.
Restores the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.
This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> property to `false`.
Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />에 연결된 컨트롤의 확장 또는 축소 상태를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The state of the control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Tab" /> enumeration value.
Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />에 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />의 자식 요소 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
The child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A> method returns a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> objects that represent the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.ApplicationMenu%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.QuickAccessToolBar%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> objects that belong to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A> 메서드 컬렉션을 반환 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> 나타내는 개체를 개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.ApplicationMenu%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.QuickAccessToolBar%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> 에 속하는 개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
The type name of the associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.
A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

If the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsCollapsed" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> is <see langword="false" /> and <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" /> value, this method returns an object that supports the control pattern; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsCollapsed" />의 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> 속성이 <see langword="false" />이고 <paramref name="patternInterface" />가 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" /> 또는 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" /> 값인 경우 이 메서드는 컨트롤 패턴을 지원하는 개체를 반환하고 그렇지 않을 경우 <see langword="null" />이 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" /> is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />에 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />가 화면에서 벗어났는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> is collapsed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
This API is not implemented.
Gets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> allows more than one child element to be selected concurrently.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />에서 자식 요소를 동시에 둘 이상 선택할 수 있는지 여부를 지정하는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> requires at least one child element to be selected.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />에서 최소한 하나의 자식 요소를 선택해야 하는지 여부를 지정하는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.
